generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along the sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs.
- building: Modern buildings with multiple windows and balconies are visible on both sides of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in the median.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and bright.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections along the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are mounted on poles along the road.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the side of the road and some are in motion.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk near the left side of the image.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
